definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: We expect yield curves to steepen significantly over the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 我们预计收益率曲线将在中期显著变陡。

sentences.english: Yield isc alc ulated based on the quarterly share class.
sentences.chinese: 收益率的计算是基于每季的股份级别。

sentences.english: They provide much better yields than ordinary Treasuries unless inflation disappears.
sentences.chinese: 它们提供比普通国债更好的收益率，除非通胀消失。

sentences.english: Speculators Õ too believe Treasury yields will rise in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 投机者也相信短期美国国债收益率将会上升。

sentences.english: What is the portfolio expected return?
sentences.chinese: 投资组合的预期收益率是什么？

sentences.english: Lately, some munis have offered tax-free yields of more than 6%.
sentences.chinese: 近来一些市政公债所提供的免税收益率超过6%。

sentences.english: Short-term Treasury rates continued to stay low Monday.
sentences.chinese: 短期美国国债收益率周一仍维持在低水平。

sentences.english: Then, 17% of rated high-yield borrowers defaulted.
sentences.chinese: 当时，以高收益率发债的公司有17%出现违约。

sentences.english: Comparing bond yields before and after the announcements bears this out.
sentences.chinese: 公司债券的收益率在公告前后的变化也证实了这一点。

sentences.english: For a start, the US is not the only country that has tried to revive its economy through ultra-loose monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 不过，收益率曲线也是表明货币政策立场的一项指标。

sentences.english: That compares with an annualized return of about 10% for a typical agreed-on deal.
sentences.chinese: 比较而言，一般商定交易的年化收益率在10%左右。

sentences.english: Bond prices and yields move in opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 债券的价格和其收益率成反比。

sentences.english: In the end, the author recommends a section of computer program of calculating the value of IRR by using the the Progressive Appr…
sentences.chinese: 最后，推荐了一段计算内部收益率的计算机程序。

sentences.english: This migration will enable QVC to enhance productivity and profitability at its plant.
sentences.chinese: 此举将帮助QVC加强生产率和收益率。
惠普的净收益率几乎达20%。

sentences.english: The main aim of this essay discusses is about how to actually get the hurdle rate.
sentences.chinese: 本文关注的是如何估计出项目的必要收益率。

definition: certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
